definitions: the process of developing or being developed

examples.text: she traces the development of the novel
the development of less invasive treatment

shortDefinitions: process of developing or being developed

definitions: a specified state of growth or advancement

examples.text: the wings attain their full development several hours after birth

shortDefinitions: specified state of growth or advancement

definitions: a new and refined product or idea

examples.text: the latest developments in information technology

shortDefinitions: new and advanced product or idea

definitions: an event constituting a new stage in a changing situation

examples.text: I don't think there have been any new developments since yesterday

shortDefinitions: event constituting new stage in changing situation

definitions: the process of converting land to a new purpose by constructing buildings or making use of its resources
shortDefinitions: process of converting land to new purpose by constructing buildings or making use of its resources

definitions: an area of land with new buildings on it

examples.text: a major housing development in Chicago

shortDefinitions: area of land with new buildings on it

definitions: the process of starting to experience or suffer from an ailment or feeling
shortDefinitions: process of starting to be affected by ailment or feeling

definitions: the process of treating photographic film with chemicals to make a visible image

examples.text: agitation is carried out while a film is processed to ensure even development

shortDefinitions: process of treating photographic film with chemicals

definitions: the process of bringing one's pieces into play in the opening phase of a game

examples.text: I sought to take advantage of Black's defective development

shortDefinitions: process of bringing one's pieces into play in opening phase of game
